document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Stenus viridanus group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) from China with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Stenus viridanus group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) from China with descriptions of two new species

bibRefCitation.author: Champion
bibRefCitation.refString: Champion, G. C. (1925) Some Indian Coleoptera. The Entomologist ' s Monthly Magazine, 61, 101 - 112, 169 - 181.

18.VII.2001
, Wrase (cSch).
Distribution. China ( Zhejiang , Jiangxi , Shaanxi Guizhou , Hubei , Chongqing , Sichuan , Yunnan ), India , Pakistan , Bhutan .

Measurements. BL: 5.6–6.9mm , FL: 3.1–3.6 mm . HW: 1.16–1.23 mm , PL: 0.91–1.05 mm , PW: 0.82–0.94 mm , EL: 1.29–1.47 mm , EW: 1.22–1.37 mm , SL: 1.02–1.25 mm . Head 0.90–0.95 times as wide as elytra, pronotum 1.10–1.12 times as long as wide, elytra 1.06–1.07 times as long as wide.
Notes. The species is new to Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Hubei, Chongqing and Yunnan.
